QuestData.Title: Stealing Their Thunder
QuestData.Description: The vrykul are fearless in a fight. Seems they actually yearn fer a death in battle. With their numbers and that ferocity, we're doomed - plain and simple.$b$bThere's one they esteem though, goes by the name of Ingvar. Bring him down and you'll deal a mighty blow to their spirit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defender Mordun has asked you to acquire the head of Ingvar the Plunderer.
QuestData.CompletionText: Good to see you're well, $n.$b$bWe've had about as many casualties as we can handle.
QuestData.RewardText: Outstanding!$b$bThis could be the turn of luck we've all been hoping for.
